title: YouTubeโs long unskippable ads may have finally met their match
summary: YouTube's unskippable ads are out of control, but one country just stepped in to push back.
body: Credit: Edgar Cervantes / Android Authority TL;DR A country has introduced new rules that dramatically limit how long unskippable video ads can run on platforms like YouTube. The move targets long, forced ads and also bans delays when closing static ads. While ads fund creators on the platform, the regulation aims to rein in practices that many users feel are seriously hurting the viewing experience. Itโs safe to say that unskippable ads on YouTube are only getting longer and becoming an extreme nuisance. Of course, you can always pay for YouTube Premium to eliminate ads or use alternatives like the Morphe app , but the truth is that those options arenโt for everyone. No one can really stop YouTube from running more ads on the platform or increasing the length of unskippable commercials, which currently go up to 30 seconds. However, one country is now fighting back, not with popular opinion, but actual laws.

title: Motorola just announced a FIFA Razr, a new smart tracker, and more at CES
summary: We're getting the FIFA World Cup 26 Edition Razr, the Moto Tag 2, the Moto Watch, and the Moto Pen Ultra.
body: Credit: Ryan Haines / Android Authority TL;DR Motorola has unveiled five products at CES 2026: the Motorola Razr Fold, a special FIFA World Cup 26 Edition Razr, the Moto Tag 2 tracker, the Moto Watch, and the Moto Pen Ultra stylus. The FIFA World Cup Edition Razr is cosmetically customized but uses identical hardware as the regular Razr (2025), retailing for $699.99 starting in February. Moto Tag 2 offers improved battery life and support for UWB. The new Moto Watch smartwatch offers extended standby time without requiring Wear OS. The Moto Pen Ultra is designed for Edge and Razr users. CES 2026 is underway, and itโs the best platform around for making a big announcement. Motorola took the opportunity to announce the new Motorola Razr Fold , but thatโs not the only new product they are bringing to the market. The company also has new products, including the FIFA World Cup 26 Edition Razr, the Moto Tag 2, the Moto Watch, and the Moto Pen Ultra. FIFA World Cup 26 Edition Razr
